EmailTemplate.subject: 7-Eleven Fuel Card Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Now is the best time to apply for the 7-Eleven Fuel Card Program! Apply now for 7 months of 11¢ off per gallon.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Whether your business is large or small, take charge of your fueling expenses with the 7-Eleven Fuel Card Program. For a limited time only, 7-Eleven is offering 7 months of 11¢ off every gallon purchased at 7-Eleven with the 7-Eleven Fuel Card!
The 7-Eleven Fuel Card is the perfect way to simplify your vehicle fueling and eliminate hours of paperwork.
- 7 months of 11¢ off every gallon*
- Nationwide card acceptance and monthly fuel rebates at every 7-Eleven store
- Pre-set card controls to help prevent fraud and unwanted spending
- Online and mobile account management to alleviate hours of receipt collection, sorting and reimbursing drivers
You can reach me at {!User.Phone} or via email at {!User.Email}.
Don’t wait any longer to start saving 11¢ per gallon on fuel.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone: {!User.Phone} Email: {!User.Email}
*For new accounts only, subject to credit approval. Promotional rebate applies to all gallons purchased at 7-Eleven up to 9,999 gallons per month. Standard program rebates apply after the promotional period ends. Rebates are subject to change at any time without prior notice.
